subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Having outscored its opponents by an average of 30 points a game, No. 10 Purdue faced its first test in the semifinals of the N.I.T. Season Tip-Off tournament.
snippet: Having outscored its opponents by an average of 30 points a game, No. 10 Purdue faced its first test in the semifinals of the N.I.T. Season Tip-Off tournament.
